evidence.source_document: Emergency Motion for an Immediate Administrative Stay and Stay Pending Appeal
evidence.text: Despite extending collective bargaining rights broadly to employees of the foreign service, Congress granted the President the authority to 'exclude any subdivision of the Department from coverage' of the Statute. ... The exclusion in Section 4103(b) has never been invoked.
